Reviews.Title: Excellent for remote monitoring on PC & iPhone
Reviews.Author: Dan Robbins

Reviews.Title: Excellent system for a reasonable price

ProductInfo.Features:
Advanced H.264 Video Compression
CIF Real-Time Recording (30FPS per channel x 4 cameras = 120FPS Total) / D1 Recording Option (7.5FPS per channel x 4 cameras = 30FPS Total)
Stream Live Video Directly to a remote PC, iPhone, iPad, Blackberry Curve 8900, Bold 9000-9700 only, and other Supported Smartphone Running Windows Mobile Pro or Symbian on 3G Networks. Trigger Email Alerts on Motion Detection Events
4 Color CMOS Camera Kits: Weatherproof Outdoor/Indoor Use; 400 TV Lines Resolution; 24 Infrared LEDs providing 40 Ft. Night Vision, 3-axis flexible mouting brackets
Pre-Installed 320GB Hard Drive
ProductInfo.Name: Q-See QR414-411-3 4-Channel H.264 Real-Time Surveillance DVR 4 CMOS Color Camera Kits Pre-Installed 320 GB Hard Drive
